issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: UFS unresponsive; absent client reply warning in systemctl logs

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
While triaging EUCA-13151, one of the regions - {{drake}} - would return the following error for any user facing API call:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
euform-describe-stacks: error: connection error (('Connection aborted.', gaierror(-2, 'Name or service not known')))
[root@d-02 ~]# euserv-describe-services
euserv-describe-services: error: connection error (('Connection aborted.', gaierror(-2, 'Name or service not known')))
{code}
The UFS on that cloud failed to start successfully after a restart attempt.  After another attempt to restart the eucalyptus-cloud service on the UFS, the UFS came back up correctly, however the following messages were contained in the system logs:
{code}
[root@d-14 ~]# systemctl restart eucalyptus-cloud.service
[root@d-14 ~]# journalctl -f

*Setup*

_Eucalyptus Version_

{{4.4.0-0.25734.119.20170117git96ba726.el7}}

_Steps_

# Created federated setup with two Eucalyptus clouds
#* [hspencer-240-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/240/]
#* [hspencer-243-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/243/]
#* {code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-regions
REGION	drake	http://ec2.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://ec2.c-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
fields.summary: Absent client warnings in system logs after restart of UFS
fields.environment:
Federated VPC setup
* {{drake}} region - 1 AZ
* {{future}} region - 2 AZ
